items-with-spells-5e.WARN_OWNED: You are editing an owned Item's spells, any changes made here will not be applied to the spells on the owning actor.
items-with-spells-5e.SPELL_LEVEL_HINT: If this spell is to be cast at a specific level, configure the level above.
items-with-spells-5e.LIMITED_HINT: If this spell has a number of uses per rest or similar innate limitations, configure the number of charges above.
items-with-spells-5e.CHARGES_HINT: If this spell will be cast using charges from the parent item, configure the number of charges above.
items-with-spells-5e.SAVE_HINT: If this spell has a flat DC or other specialized saving throw logic.
items-with-spells-5e.WARN_CANNOT_ADDREMOVE: An Owned Item's spells cannot be added to or removed from. These spells have been added to the Actor's Spellbook Tab.
items-with-spells-5e.MISSING_ITEM_DESCRIPTION: This Spell's original item could not be found. Maybe it was deleted?
items-with-spells-5e.WARN_ALSO_DELETE: This will also delete the Spell from the Actor. Are you certain you want to delete the embedded spell?
items-with-spells-5e.QUERY_ALSO_DELETE: Would you also like to delete the spells from that item?
items-with-spells-5e.SETTINGS.ITEM_EXCLUSION.NAME: Select Item Types
items-with-spells-5e.SETTINGS.ITEM_EXCLUSION.HINT: Select which item types can have spells attached.
items-with-spells-5e.SETTINGS.ITEM_EXCLUSION.TITLE: Item Type Exclusion Menu
items-with-spells-5e.SETTINGS.SORT_ORDER.NAME: Spellbook Sort Order
items-with-spells-5e.SETTINGS.SORT_ORDER.HINT: If checked, spellbook sections added by this module will be put at the bottom of the spellbook tab, rather than the top.
